page.title: 03 COMMERCIAL 2
page.content: There are two Jewellery shops, one of which sells hand made jewellery. The chemist is joined to a gift shop, which also sells photographic gear. "The Studio", is a gift shop selling fashionable jewellery, photographic gear, herbal tea etc. and also hires out videos. Another gift shop is "Aladdins Cave", which is only open during the summer, for the tourists. "The Art and Craft Shop" is a fairly new shop, which sells anything made by local people. It is rather like a gift shop. "The Mill"is a summer refreshments shop, selling sweets, drinks,etc. The newest shop is "Scampers", which was opened in 1985, it is a boutique, selling clothes. The only "diesel station"!!, provides spare parts for tractors.
